steps: step 2: Click on link 'Phone' -> Navigate to page 'category/phone'
step 4: Select and buy items to place an order
step 5: Proceed to checkout after entering email and shipping info
step 6: Enter delivery and shipping address details for payment
step 7: Click on input field 'payment method id'
step 8: Click on button 'COMPLETE ORDER' -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
step 9: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
